T.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,salary,first_name,last_name,birth_date,hire_date,from_date  from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no where (e.emp_no = 50481 and s.from_date = '1996-12-23' and gender = 'M') or (birth_date = '1953-09-02' and salary > 60000);

F.query: select e.emp_no  as emp_no ,salary,first_name,last_name,birth_date,hire_date,from_date from employees e join salaries s on e.emp_no = s.emp_no where (e.emp_no = 50481 and s.from_date = '1996-12-23' and gender = 'M') or (hire_date = '1953-09-02' and salary > 60000);
